mapper.select:
select rst.service_code, rst.request_date, rst.progress_status, rst.user_code, rst.user_name, rst.main_phone_number, rst.sub_phone_number, rst.postal_code, rst.main_address, rst.detail_address,
stt.service_type_name,
pmd.model_number,
(select COUNT(*) from recall_service_table where user_code = #{user_code}) as total_count from recall_service_table rst LEFT OUTER JOIN service_type_table stt on(stt.service_type_code = rst.service_type_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN product_model_detail pmd on(pmd.model_code = rst.model_code) where user_code = #{user_code} order by progress_status desc, request_date desc limit #{index}, 10;

select IFNULL(MAX(id2), 0) + 1 as id2, RPAD(#{temp_service_code}, CHAR_LENGTH(#{temp_service_code}) + CHAR_LENGTH((IFNULL(MAX(id2), 1) + 1)) + 1, '0') + IFNULL(MAX(id2), 0) + 1 as service_code from recall_service_table where id1 = #{model_code};
mapper.update: update recall_service_table set progress_status = 0 where service_code = #{service_code};
